pullrequest.title: Suppress cpplint warning about whitespace with function pointers

content.raw:
I tried this branch with ign-common and I still get these:

~~~
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:29:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:73:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:85:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:98:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:112:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:128:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:144:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:161:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:179:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
~~~

I removed the whole build folders and started from scratch, am I doing anything wrong?
